info.name: Smart Factory API
info.description: Complete API collection for Smart Factory Backend with authentication, user management, recipes, projects, tasks (with media uploads), devices, alerts, KPI, and reports. Includes file upload examples with multipart/form-data.

request.description: Login as admin user and save tokens
Login as worker using employee number
Refresh access token using refresh token
Get all users with pagination (Admin only)
Get specific user by ID (Admin only)
